info.title: Facebook Graph (Group Doc) API
info.description: API for managing Facebook Group Docs

get.summary: Represents a doc within a Facebook group
get.description: Represents a doc within a Facebook group

parameters.name: can_delete
parameters.description: Whether the session user can delete this doc (on Facebook.com).

parameters.name: can_edit
parameters.description: Whether the session user can edit this doc.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The profile that created this doc.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The URL for the doc's icon

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The body of the doc. This string will contain HTML for any formatting in the doc, and will be HTML encoded.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: An ID representing the current doc revision.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The last time the doc was changed.
